Coordinate System

Idea:

Because we work almost always in a 3D environment, becoming familiar with the 3D coordinate system is important. In OpenGL the coordinate system is defined as follows

o The +ve x axis goes from left to right.

o The +ve y axis goes from bottom to top.

o The +ve z axis is perpendicular to the screen and is directed towards your eye.
